### Tender Notice

#### Tender Notice Details

* **Title**: HVAC Inspection, Installation & Repairs
* **Reference Number**: PW-PWY-036-9166
* **Solicitation Number**: EP975-220276/B

#### Tendering Information

* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-09-07T17:00:00
* **Tender Status**: Expiré
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

#### Trade Agreements

* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Service Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) has a requirement for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision of Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) services, installations, alterations, testing and repair work, as and when required, at detachments or houses located throughout the Yukon Territory for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP).

The person performing the work must be qualified/certified to provide the necessary professional services to the full extent in the Yukon Territory for the Classes of Labour required. The contractor must provide all labor, materials, tools, and equipment for the complete service of HVAC systems in accordance with local, provincial and Federal requirements.

The Standing Offer is for a 1-year fixed term from date of award with two option years. The Standing Offer value is estimated to be $975,000.00 (GST included). Only one (1) Standing Offer will be authorized.

### Security Requirements

* The Contractor/Offeror must, at all times during the performance of the Contract/Standing Offer, hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS), issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).
* The Contractor/Offeror personnel requiring access to PROTECTED information, assets or sensitive site(s) must EACH hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS, granted or approved by the CSP, PWGSC.

### Important Notice to Bidders

* Suppliers are required to submit bids electronically using the Canada Post epost Connect application for the subject bid solicitation.
* For more information, please send an email to [TPSGC.RPReceptiondess
